title: Mala Xiao Yuanjia
synopsis: The kind-hearted and simple rural old man Zhou Fugui went to the city with his son Tue Mao and his wife Shufen to live in a residential community in downtown Chongqing. The ordinary life of this family of three is the epitome and true portrayal of small families among Chongqing citizens. The sour, sweet, bitter, and spicy can be said to be full of flavors and vivid colors. The story shows the unique charm of New Chongqing and the new style of Chongqing people to the audience through laughter and curse, and vividly outlines a wonderful picture of urban and rural life.  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Baixue Gongzhu Chuanqi
synopsis: A little girl who lost her way came in from the wooden house of the seven dwarfs. Because she firmly believed that the missing father was still alive, she wandered around looking for her father only with a clue left by the feather of a divine bird. Snow White and the dwarf were moved by her true feelings and perseverance, and decided to help her. The dwarves made a huge hot air balloon and took Snow White and the little girl to Bird Island. They only learned the true whereabouts of the missing father after seeing the divine bird after all the hardships. Snow White and the dwarf strayed into the trap and were caught on the way to save people. At this time, the queen appeared, wearing the most beautiful dress in the world, and the disappearance of father and the fate of the little girl are very important to this dress. Relationship. Where did the dress come from, how did everyone escape from danger, and can father and daughter finally be reunited?  (translated from tenceng)

title: Xiao Feiji Ka Ka
synopsis: Kaka and his partners are a group of cute little planes, and they live happily in the scenic Rainbow Bay. They are warm, kind, hard-working, and full of love. Kaka is smart and lively, very responsible, and loves to behave; the smiling Uncle Lolo is a bit annoying recently, because he has reached the age of retirement; the young Mango Wen is naughty like a child who has not grown up; Is willing to serve everyone. Airplane babies love to show off exciting and startling flying stunts in the air, but they are usually very gentle and considerate, full of gentlemanly demeanor. They also get along well with the animals in Rainbow Bay. The film is relaxed and happy, showing the children the values of responsibility, cooperation, fraternity, tolerance and acceptance with the positive work and life attitude of the baby airplane. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Jisu Liu Kong Qiu
synopsis: To tell the story of the incomprehensible relationship between the male protagonist, high school student Ouyang Mushang and the six-hole ball, Ouyang Mushang has grown from a rookie player who only pays attention to personal emotions, through hard training and various competitions, to a team spirit. , A professional player at the core of the team with a sense of honor and mission.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shaonian Caocao
synopsis: It tells the story of Cao Cao and his friends experiencing all kinds of fun and hardships, wisely coping with them, and growing up together. The film three-dimensionally shows the young Cao Cao's multi-faceted talents and rich and complex character from different sides, and refines the excellent qualities of the young Cao Cao, such as wit, courage, diligence, studious, and justice, and fills the gaps in the young Cao Cao's animated story. The film focuses on historical accumulation, proves and demonstrates the historical and cultural charm of Bozhou, combined with the turbulent social situation in the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, shows the historical background of the period from multiple angles, and also shows the vivid and interesting legends and richness of young Cao Cao and his partners The colorful social life skillfully connects Bozhou's historical sites, local customs, and local specialties to create a three-dimensional historical picture. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xingxing Meng
synopsis: "Star Dream" is an animation work created by CCTV CCTV Animation Co., Ltd. with the theme of "Chinese Dream" and "Children's Dream" as the starting point, focusing on children's inner world and values, and delivering positive energy. The film strives to present the excitement of "children’s dreams" in a rich animation form, and through a series of interesting and allegorical short stories, while listening to and accompanying the children in building and chasing dreams, it conveys the correctness to the audience. The values and cultural orientation of the company encourage and guide children to work hard in order to realize their dreams.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xingxing Meng
synopsis: Inspirational chapter of the second season of the Chinese dream-themed cartoon "Star Dream".  (translated from CCTV)

title: Xingxing Meng Season2
synopsis: Inspirational chapter of the second season of the Chinese dream-themed cartoon "Star Dream".  (translated from CCTV)

title: Geng Cun Minjian Gushi
synopsis: The cartoon series "Geng Village Folk Tales" is adapted from the national intangible cultural heritage-"Geng Village Folk Tales". Each episode is an independent chapter, with the theme of punishing evil and promoting good, praising justice, and promoting the diligence, bravery and selflessness of the ancient Chinese people. The plot is tortuous and bizarre, the pictures are fascinating, the language is simple and straightforward, and the content is easy to understand. The protagonists are kind, industrious, and simple, and at the same time defying violence, steadfast and unyielding, they show people a world of innocence, simplicity, beauty and fantasy.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Chao Neng Xingzhi Shikong Yingxiong
synopsis: A thousand years ago, Earth boy Bu Pingfan came to Phoenix Star Valley tens of thousands of light-years away due to another adventure, and participated in the Phoenix war against the brutal and dark bitter, and wrote a heroic poem! Thousands of years later, Xingjia from Lanjia and Edison from Phoenix Star Valley landed on Earth for different reasons. After being reborn, Xingjia met Xia Ji, Luna and other partners. Edison intends to involve the earth in his wild plan! A battle to defend the earth ended in the destruction of Edison! A few years later, the earth radiated new vitality in the process of peaceful development, until a new crisis approached-Dark Biting infected a group of interstellar thugs coming towards the earth. "  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Peng Peng De Shijie
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Xia Xiao Dou
synopsis: Xia Xiaodou is a 5-year-old kitten. Xia Xiaodou, who was in kindergarten, appeared in front of people all day long wearing a red turban. Xia Xiaodou has a puppy Xia Xiaoya who is with him day and night, and his father Xia Lulu and his mother Tali who love him. A cat named Shadow often followed Xia Xiaodou, looking for all possible opportunities, and wanted to tell Xiaodou’s life history, why he lived with people from "Doggo Country" but looked different, and tried every means to prepare to bring him. Take a small pocket. Xia Xiaodou lives harmoniously in the dog world, and tells many interesting stories  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Baba Mama Xiaoshihou De Gushi
synopsis: Time flies, the era of material scarcity is far away from us, and the happiness of those youths is deeply buried in our hearts by our generation. As parents, do we still remember the youth of you and me-those who have passed away Childhood memories? Listen to a story and experience an old time; appreciate an animation and reminiscence the whole childhood. Revisiting "The Story of Mom and Dad When They Are Children", to find who I was once. Let the memory wings fly lightly, to trace the long-lasting but true happiness.  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 爸爸妈妈小时候的故事

title: You Er Gushi Dawang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Xiao Xiao Dou Leyuan
synopsis: This film tells the story of a child named Duotou in a small remote village. After a boring walk one afternoon, he suddenly found Anado. Anado was originally a little Baylor in the Qing Dynasty. He was in the courtyard for a day. Playing, accidentally stepped on a special stone. The stone was made of meteorites used by Empress Nuwa back then. It was full of powerful power to travel through time and space. Anado was brought to the village where the dumb head was located by this magical power. Then many stories happened. The two teased each other and interfered with each other. , Not convinced, as the story progressed, the two struggled more fiercely but in the end they did not succeed in teasing each other. One day Anado discovered the magic stone he had stepped on. He was going to go back. Instead, he was a little confused. She, the two of them reluctantly think of the recent happy days. Anado and Datou, the two little friends, became good friends, and Datou reluctantly sent away Anado. Lost and walked back, feeling extremely sad, Anado did not go smoothly, the magical stone failed, he just crossed to the other end of the village, the next two will meet again, what will it be like?  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yukuai De Shiwumen

title: Chun Chun Chengzhang Ji Zhi Qingchunqi Pian
synopsis: It mainly describes the various growth "troubles" encountered during the spring and spring period, closely combining with the current situation of society, and caring for the healthy growth of the spring teenager from both psychological and physical levels. To convey to the parents the concept of correct treatment of the problems of teenagers's growth, and to help Chun juvenile sort out the puzzles he faced in his growth. (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 春春成长记之青春期篇

title: Chun Chun Chengzhang Ji Zhi Fangzhi Ertong Yiwai Pian

details.Japanese: 春春成长记之防止儿童意外篇

title: Lan Se Julebu
synopsis: By various coincidences, several people who had not been in contact with each other met on a pirate ship named Qihang, so the story of their journey around began.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shoguo Xiao Zhen
synopsis: A group of innocent and cute fruits and vegetables with different personalities grow up happily in the vibrant vegetable and fruit town. But they didn't know that the crisis was coming quietly. The returnee Doctor Cabbage Insect inherited the Castle of Dead Tree. The ambitious he wanted to take the Fruit and Vegetable Town as his own...  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Renzhe Meng Jian Chuan
synopsis: The ninja adults have formed a super club "Ninja Cute Group" to shoulder the mission of maintaining social harmony. However, the ninjas with superpowers seem to be weird, the super-colored wretched uncle Ying-sama, Captain Diaosi Fujuro, the cold beauty Sakura, the bone demon...their "arrogance" has caused the emperor. Extremely dissatisfied, so the ninjas encountered the most challenging task in history-helping the old man who fell to the ground for 72 hours...  (translated from bilibili)

title: Ji Ji Dou
synopsis: The story of this film takes place in a fairy tale world of beans. Long ago, beans were infested by insects. Later, a bean named Luohandou bravely defeated the insects and established Doudou City. Everyone respectfully calls him Luohandou Superman. Since then, more beans have come to Doudou City to seek the protection of Luohan Dou Superman. Many years later, Doudou City has become a paradise for beans, where all kinds of beans live. Four small beans from different places-Huangdou Card Card, Red Dou Lili, Mung Dou Xiao Cong, Hei Dou Heiqiang were sent to Doudou City by their parents to study and live. The four little beans all have distinct personalities and are different. For example, Huang Dou is a brave little guy, but he is also easily impulsive, and is a typical daredevil. Red beans are kind and cute, but sometimes too squeamish. Mung Bean is smart and easy to learn, a little inventor, but too timid. Heidou is simple and honest, a little clumsy, and poor in understanding. The four little beans met and became good friends on the way to Doudou City. At the same time, they also met a hungry iron beetle with headshots and two men on the road-the sleepworm Dumb and the follower Pizi. The three insects were planning to go to Doudou City to catch the beans, and they happened to ran into four little beans who were not deeply involved in the world. The bug deceives Xiaodouzi into claiming to be Douzi's good friend, and prepares to introduce Xiaodouzi into the trap and catch him. On the other hand, Teacher Landou from Doudou City came to meet the four little beans on the order of the mayor. Teacher Landou rescued those who fell into the bug trap. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Bang Bang Tuan Xiang Qian Chong
synopsis: There is a beautiful village Jimu Village on Peach Blossom Island. The residents of the village are all cute animals. The smart and kind little yellow dog Habedo and his friends live in Jimu Village. The "Gang Group" is the guardian of the village. The leader Habedo is the core of the team. He has a sense of justice, is smart, honest, and kind. He is never afraid of challenges. He can always face up to difficulties when encountering difficulties and destroy the king. Mai Dou is wise and brave. Under his leadership, the gang can always do everything in their favor and become a veritable guardian of Yoshiki Village. The toad gray wheat, who intends to turn Peach Blossom Island into a toad paradise, is a sabotage king. On the surface, he runs a tea shop with his subordinates, Abu, but secretly established a secret base under an abandoned well, racking his brains to specially develop various An agent that can pollute the environment does damage. Fortunately, every crisis can be subtly resolved by the gang led by Haberdo, protecting the environment of Peach Blossom Island and maintaining the harmony and tranquility of Jimu Village.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Qiaopi Da Zui Mao Zhi Youchang Jiaqi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 俏皮大嘴猫之悠长假期

title: Qiaopi Da Zui Mao Zhi Meng Chong Tianxia
synopsis: This is a story about a cat’s adventure. It walks on tiptoe to the corners of the city and sees the whole world from the perspective of a cat. When the sun rose, it squatted on the wall and yawned to watch the busy people. When the night was dark, it passed through the eaves lightly and blended into the night. It is also the big-mouthed cat, the owner's baby pet. The main line is the big-mouthed cat and the owner Ah Yao, telling stories about love and warmth between animals and between animals and humans, conveying positive energy, showing the natural ecological picture scroll in the city, and presenting it in a fresh and pleasant way. The audience promoted the themes of kindness to animals and harmony between humans and animals.  (translated from bilibili)

details.Japanese: 俏皮大嘴猫之萌宠天下

title: Qiaopi Da Zui Mao Zhi Chengshi Youxia
synopsis: On a stormy night, an old cat under the bridge gave birth to four kittens. Among them, a tiger-patterned kitten with a very fat and big mouth is our protagonist, the big-mouthed cat. The big-mouthed cat, hiding under the old newspaper, woke up and found that the world was left with only itself, so it wandered lonely in the streets and lanes, seeking a stable life.  (translateds form bilibili)

details.Japanese: 俏皮大嘴猫之城市游侠

title: Qiaopi Da Zui Mao Zhi Chong Fan Chengshi
synopsis: This is a story about a cat’s adventure. It walks on tiptoe to the corners of the city and sees the whole world from the perspective of a cat. When the sun rose, it squatted on the wall and yawned to watch the busy people. When the night was dark, it passed through the eaves lightly and blended into the night. It is also the big-mouthed cat, the owner's baby pet. title: Shenqi Luse Xin
synopsis: The film unfolds from the perspective of a little girl Tintin, telling a series of stories about the symbiosis of man and nature. The quiet Muju Village is located in the depths of the big forest. The villagers have long been integrated with nature, and each has its own unique plants. The dexterous shower head, cute tomato Mimi, smart starfruit Xiaobo, tall banana Bobo, lead a free campus life under the leadership of teacher Aka with rose flowers  (translated from youku)

title: Xingyun Pai Chuanshuo
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Bai Xiang Zheme Duo
synopsis: The first domestic micro-animation featuring the turning point of God. The network has distinctive characteristics. Each episode is about three minutes long and consists of independent short stories between the protagonist Xiaobai and different characters. This is a micro-animation of the most two gods in history! Love, family affection, good friends, heavy tastes, a spoof hilarious style rooted in the Internet, perfectly combined with fast-paced animation, open minded, emphasize content and not constrained to form, audiences can experience it in every episode The pleasure brought by the fast pace and the turning of God! (translated from bilibili)

title: Xingji Paobing Tuan Zhi Hu Hua Shizhe
synopsis: The story of the Interstellar Artillery Corps adventuring on all planets in the universe, saving the flowers, and finally defeating the evil shameless devil. (translated form iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星际炮兵团之护花使者

title: Xingji Paobing Tuan Zhi Zhengjiu Secai
synopsis: This was originally a colorful universe. Every planet was planted with flowers that could represent this planet. One day, all the planets lost their color, and the universe became monotonous black and white. This made the earth emperor who loves colors very sad. The little prince Zhao Jingkang led his artillery regiment to the nearest Mars to investigate the cause. In order to save the flowers, Zhao Jingkang led the artillery regiment to various planets and started with the flower-eaters. fighting  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 星际炮兵团之拯救色彩

title: Mengxiang Zi Ke
synopsis: Sanyang Kaitai, the happy New Year of the Goat will soon enter thousands of households with the sound of firecrackers. In the new year, the inspirational animation "Dream Client" jointly produced by Lecheng Culture and SMG's Xinhui Animation will be launched in March. The Hu Ma team of Lecheng Travel Agency travels through family inheritance for their own ideals. The readers serve classics and introduce the different ethnic customs and geography of different parts of China to the travellers. Although it is a story about the tourism industry, it is by no means boring. The different personalities of the protagonists in the animation collide, and the series of oolongs and jokes formed are turned into a little bit of laughter on the road to entrepreneurship. Each episode tells about the intractable diseases encountered by a Lecheng travel agency with the protagonist "Hu Ma" as the core, but strange thinking and hard work solve these difficulties and spread positive energy with its unique Lecheng spirit (translated from baidu baike)

title: Huangdou Bao Er
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Fendou Ba! Songshu Xiao Jian
synopsis: Do your best! "Squirrel Xiaojian" is a positive energy series of cartoons showing the entrepreneurial journey of Squirrel Xiaojian. The protagonist of the film, Squirrel Xiaojian, is based on the three squirrel sub-brand Squirrel Xiaojian, adding more creative and vibrant roles. Xiao Jian is a squirrel with a bright and cute personality. He is not only cheap but also cute. It can be won by the funny and sensational and warm, so he is very popular with the audience.  (translated from youku)

title: Xiao Ji Jiao Jiao He Ta De Pengyoumen
synopsis: The prototypes of the stories in the cartoon come from Tin Man fans from all over the country or overseas, so everyone will see their worries, willfulness, strengths, and weaknesses in Jiao Jiao.  (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 小鸡叫叫和他的朋友们

title: Meng Cai Jiadao
synopsis: A group of Mengcai living in Mengcai Village is more interesting and fun than life.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Baobei Yi Jia
synopsis: The story takes place in an ordinary family in a modern city. One night, the arrival of Mou Mou, a little alien from Candy Planet, made his family fall out of the sky. At first, the family was like a big enemy, but then he discovered that Mou Mou was not scary at all, but rather behaved. He saved Xiao Xiao Baby Yoyo. Everyone finally decided to take him in, and Mou Mou officially became a member of the family and was elected as the family's mascot. In terms of style, the play has a strong comedy color. The humorous language can be seen everywhere in the play, and the playful plots are everywhere, which makes people laugh and laugh. In the laughter, forget the troubles and fill the heart with sunshine. . The addition of the little aliens brings magic to the story, making the drama bloom on the bars, full of fairy tales, which will greatly satisfy the curiosity of the small audiences and light up their innocence. fantasy.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhege Nusheng Hen Putong
synopsis: The story tells the hilarious daily life of the protagonist and a group of strange colleagues  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Buding
synopsis: Little Pudding is a little boy with 5 cool hairstyles with an inverted c character on his head. He has crazy and interesting ideas and endless spooky ideas. There are many interesting things happening around him. Seeing him is like seeing us. His childhood was carefree and colorful. Ke Ketang, Gu Gu Chong, and Mei Mei Zhou are all his little friends, as well as a baby pig, who was originally a little fairy in the heavens. Baby Pig has an infinitely powerful "magic card" in the heavens. From then on, the life of the little Pudding family has become more exciting...  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Xian Min Zi
synopsis: This film tells the story of Min Ziqian, a filial piety among the 72 sages of Confucius. Min Zi was born in Suzhou, Anhui more than 2500 years ago. His ancestors were all scholars. In Min Zi’s life, Min The son’s mother died young. He and his father depended on each other for life. When his father continued, he respected his stepmother as his biological mother, leaving behind a touching little story, highlighting the kindness and love of the teenager Min Ziqian and his filial piety. Leading by example, the beautiful character of diligence and studious, Ziqian's love, courage, fraternity and respect for the elderly affect and affect the people around him.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Nuo Nuo Zu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
background:

(translated from iqiyi)

title: Jia You Nanhai
synopsis: The 6-year-old Pi Doudou is a naughty little man. He is kind and cute, and has many fantastic ideas. Dad Pi Dawei likes to support his son's ideas, and his mother always hopes everything will be well. Grandma likes to be used to it. With Doudou, and grandpa likes military management, different educational concepts are in conflict here. However, it is more about the funny and hilarious life stories of this family. This animation has 46 episodes, each with an independent story, each episode is 11 minutes, the feature film is 9 minutes, the animation image is vivid and close to life, the story content is rich and interesting, entertaining, it shows the child’s innocence and cuteness, and also explores the current Parenting issues, hope to bring enlightenment to the audience. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Qin Xin Xiao Huoban

title: Xiongmao Dou Bi
synopsis: "Panda Dobby" depicts the farce-like growth story of the giant panda Dobby in a relaxed and fun way. In order to become a bullish storyteller, Doubi imitates all kinds of people in life every day, making up all sorts of exciting stories. Sometimes he pretends to be a male, sometimes a female, shaking his head, laughing and cursing, humorous and funny, dizzying and laughing. Speaking of sorrow, he can make a hoarse voice, crying like a complaint, and tears down, making people feel astonished. Doubi's daily life is colorful and unpredictable, and he understands the simple and real truth of life amidst impermanence. (translated from tenceng)

title: Xīhā xué yīngyǔ

title: Diannao Zongdongyuan
synopsis: The science fiction novelist Emma picked up a few alien spars when she was a child. She took the spars home. As a result, the computers at home resonated with the spars and turned into a living robot.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Peng Chacha
synopsis: In the depths of the forest, there is a carefree and happy tea holding tribe. They like to work in the tea garden every day and drink a cup of fragrant fruit tea. The chief and his children Cha Xiaomei, Cha Chuan Chuan, Cha Xiao Bai, A Xing, A Li, etc. live together happily. The village is full of laughter and laughter every day. However, one day two treasure hunters Qingpi and Curly came in the forest. They were planning how to find the village of holding tea and catch these little brown guys alive. Of course, the nectar babies will not wait to die. They used their wisdom to fight against the poachers, defeated them and protected their homeland. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Peng Chacha Zhi Guo Cha Cunzhuang De Mimi
synopsis: A group of happy fruit tea babies live in the depths of the forest. They escaped the chase of bad guys and began to build their own beautiful home. During the construction process, they unearthed many unknown secrets of the fruit tea village, and the friends were all excited about it. At the same time, the bad guys Qingpi and Curly are on the verge of bankruptcy. They have to guard against debt collection by their creditors while using various methods to catch the baby tea. The fruit tea babies finally overcome the difficulties and guard their homes.  (translated from bilibili)

synopsis: "Dudu Little Diary" tells the various interesting things Dudu encounters in daily life, through these stories to provide children with knowledge of safety, science, behavioral quality and so on.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kepu Zhongguo Zhi Long Xin Da Maoxian
synopsis: Before Pangu opened the sky, there were three ancient dragons, one could only breathe flames, one could only confuse people, and the other could only be powerful. Now their descendants live quietly by our side Huaming poisonous dragon, flame dragon, and rock beast , And work hard to retrieve the honor of our ancestors in the future.  (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 科普中国之龙心大冒险

title: Xianzi Senlin Di Meili Mimi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Ni Hao Baobao Dou
synopsis: Deep in a dense forest in the northern hemisphere, there is a small pea village in which the pea family and cute animals live. Baby beans live here. Like every baby, Baby Bean is exposed to new things every day. He will learn an English word every day, know more and more things, read, go to school, travel, know more and more friends, understand more and more truths, but at the same time have more and more questions. . Each experience stimulated Babydou's thinking, and he would also fall into choice, but fortunately, with the help of angels and family members, he can make the right choice every time and become more and more sensible. The story revolves around the growth experience of Baobabdou, and through a small story, the cute cartoon characters are smoothly connected with human beings, nature, things, events, emotions and language to enlighten babies. Baby Dou seems to be their best partner and a little teacher for them, guiding the babies towards correct values. The infant stage is the beginning of education, and the initial perception of knowledge and the development of good habits are the focus of education. Through Babydou's learning of various knowledge, children begin to form basic concepts in their minds and develop language thinking and worldview structures. At school age, we will consolidate knowledge, study systematically, and start to learn from one another. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhezhi Zongdongyuan Zhi Zhi Bao Qibing
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 折纸总动员之纸堡奇兵

title: Tomodachi no Imouto ga Ore ni dake Uzai
synopsis: If a girl teases you, that means she likes you! Unfortunately, Akiteru knows from experience that isn't the case. Because every girl he interacts with shows him nothing but scorn, and he's not scored a single date from it! Luckily, he's more concerned with securing a spot for him and his game-development buddies at his uncle's business. But when his uncle throws him a condition that involves playing the part of his daughter's boyfriend, Akiteru has no choice but to take it. What will his best friend's sister Iroha, who bullies him relentlessly, think of the news?  (Source: J-Novel Club)

details.Synonyms: My friend's sister annoying only me., My Friend's Little Sister Has It In for Me!, Imouza
details.Japanese: 友達の妹が俺にだけウザい

title: Tensai Ouji no Akaji Kokka Saisei Jutsu
synopsis: It ain't easy being a genius... Prince Wein is ready to commit treason. And who can blame him? Faced with the impossible task of ruling his pathetic little kingdom, this poor guy just can't catch a break! But with his brilliant idea of auctioning off his country, this lazy prince should be able to retire once and for all. Or that was the plan...until his treasonous schemes lead to disastrous consequences-namely, accidental victories and the favor of his people!  (Source: Yen Press)

details.English: The Genius Prince's Guide to Raising a Nation Out of Debt
details.Japanese: 天才王子の赤字国家再生術

title: Goblin Slayer 2nd Season
synopsis: Second season of Goblin Slayer.

title: Shikkakumon no Saikyou Kenja
synopsis: In a world of magic, the powers and future of a mage are predetermined at birth through so-called "Marks"—four symbols that categorize a human's aptitude for magic. Lamenting the fact that his mark was considered ill-suited for combat and only useful for magic augmentation, an incredibly skilled sage decided to reincarnate thousands years in the future. Reborn as Mathias Hildesheimr—a six-year-old boy and the third son of a duke's family—he attains the mark of close combat he always desired. Unfortunately, it is also discovered that mankind's knowledge of magic and swordsmanship has drastically deteriorated in this era; only shoddy magic equipment can be sporadically found, while even the most basic spells have been forgotten. To add insult to injury, his current mark, once hailed as the most powerful, is now viewed as the worst. When Mathias becomes 12 years old, his unrivaled swordsmanship lands him in the Second Royal Academy. Shattering prejudices, he promptly makes ripples in the academy and beyond. However, the former sage uncovers signs of dark forces working in the shadows, and with humanity weaker than ever, it is up to Mathias to thwart their evil plans.

details.Synonyms: The Strongest Sage of Disqualified Crest, Shikkakumon no Saikyokenja

title: Shokei Shoujo no Virgin Road
synopsis: The Lost Ones are wanderers who come here from a distant world known as "Japan." No one knows how or why they leave their homes. The only thing that is certain is that they bring disaster and calamity. The duty of exterminating them without remorse falls to Menou, a young Executioner. When she meets Akari, it seems like just another job...until she discovers it's impossible to kill this girl! And when Menou begins to search for a way to defeat this immortality, Akari is more than happy to tag along! So begins a journey that will change Menou forever...  (Source: Yen Press)

details.Synonyms: Shokei Shoujo no Ikiru Michi, The Executioner and Her Way of Life
details.Japanese: 処刑少女の生きる道〈バージンロード〉

title: Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life: Dai-2 no Shokugyou wo Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita
synopsis: Yuuji Sano, a black company employee, is summoned to another world while finishing his work at home. His profession in the other world, a Monster Tamer, is considered a job that makes it difficult to become an adventurer. However, thanks to some slimes he met, which read several magical books, he gained magical powers and a second profession, Sage. Yuuji acquired overwhelming power, but is he conscious of his strength? Blindly becoming unparalleled and strongest in the world! (Source: MU, edited)

details.Japanese: 転生賢者の異世界ライフ ～第二の職業を得て、世界最強になりました～

title: Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka IV
synopsis: Fourth season of Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka.

details.Synonyms: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? IV, DanMachi 4th Season, Is It Wrong That I Want to Meet You in a Dungeon 4th Season
details.Japanese: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうかⅣ

title: Juan Juan Qi Le Jie
synopsis: Juan Juan and her good friends Mona Lishark, Purple Potato Bear, Milian Cat, and Kexi Tao are the shopkeepers of Juan Juan Kira Street. Some open drinks shops, some open bars, some open gyms... They use their own uniqueness. The concept of operating the street vividly. In daily work and life, Juan Juan’s family and friends will encounter some small problems. Juan Juan always uses his own brain to help them solve problems. Come and learn interesting TIPS from the scroll!  (translated from tenceng)

title: De Se Shu
synopsis: Lai Seshu, a small squirrel living on the Sun Island of the Songhua River, is particularly capable of whistling and loves pranks; Dao Ye, the land god of the Sun Island, is particularly capable of tossing and loves nosy. These unreliable grandparents made a series of hilarious accidents in the animal world of Sun Island, which upset the peaceful and leisurely Sun Island...  (translated from youku)

title: Pan Xia Jiangmo jJi Zhi Zhengjiu Jiayuan
synopsis: This film tells the story of the brave young Zhuang Xiaoxiao and his friends Xinxin and Lele defeating the coal boss Jia Yuanwai and the big devil, learning "benevolence, righteousness, courtesy, wisdom, and faith", from which he gains the power to destroy demons and save their homes. The environment enables people in their hometowns to live a happy life. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 攀霞降魔记之拯救家园

title: Pan Xia Jiangmo Ji Zhi Shouhu Jiayuan
synopsis: The film combines the construction of filial piety culture, landscape scenery, and cultural customs of the Zhuang Autonomous Region to show the beautiful scenery of Hechi. At the same time, the film is full of positive energy, witty, and vivid, allowing young people to be inspired and increased in the relaxed and happy viewing. Wisdom, enhance the understanding of filial piety culture.  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 攀霞降魔记之守护家园

title: Xiao Shiye Ketang Zhi Yangsheng Pian
synopsis: It is a cartoon of the nature of a public welfare film, allowing children to learn good qualities such as benevolence, courage, courtesy, wisdom, faith and filial piety, and at the same time teach children a complete set of skills in environmental protection and response to natural disasters. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Shiye Ketang Zhi Wenming Pian
synopsis: It is a cartoon of the nature of a public welfare film, allowing children to learn good qualities such as benevolence, courage, courtesy, wisdom, faith and filial piety, and at the same time teach children a complete set of skills in environmental protection and response to natural disasters.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kexue Changshi Bao Hulu
synopsis: There are many phenomena around us that are easy to be ignored by us. If we open our eyes of beauty, you will find a lot of fun and interesting scientific knowledge.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Jingwei Ma Ling Shu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Dali Jingang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Dali Jingang season2

title: Zang Ling Wang
synopsis: The lead film "Tibetan Antelope King" won the "Gold Award" at the 44th Houston International Film Festival in the United States. This film is dedicated to Chinese and foreign scientists who have devoted themselves to the natural sciences for many years and has made hard work, to the compatriots who sacrificed for the protection of wildlife in the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, and to every friend who cares about himself and loves animals. Millions of Tibetan antelopes are migrating thousands of miles, and the small Tibetan antelope "Shoolu" was born in Hoh Xil, Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. On the way back home, she was chased by poachers, and her mother fell off the cliff to save her. She was alone in the wilderness and her life was hanging by a thread. Hulu meets a pair of lively and playful elf-like friends, the pika "Carla" and the lark "Sida". They traveled together to find their hometown. On the way, they experienced life and death fights with snow wolves and got rid of the stalking and harassment of poachers. Until the summer and autumn of the following year, they finally found the female Tibetan antelope returning home from the breeding area. Unfortunately, he encountered a brutal poacher. Hulu used his wisdom, kindness and bravery to eliminate danger, resolve grievances, and even rescued the life of a dying little poacher in the fountain area. When the flock of sheep fell into a desperate situation in the glacier gorge, it was their grunting behavior that moved the world and brought vitality to the Tibetan antelope flock. What is even more unexpected is that when Shulu finally returned to his hometown after sufferings, a surprising and dreamlike scene made everyone overjoyed... Through the growth experience of a male Tibetan antelope, this film shows people the miracle of life on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, depicting the vivid, humorous and primitive life stories of Tibetan antelope and its companion species, and let people experience life It is a beautiful vision of the preciousness and harmonious coexistence of man and nature. (translated from tenceng)

title: Cai Bai Tong
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Mianju Zhanshen
synopsis: Kiro (sister) and brother Bong (小峰) raise a wooden puppie named Kuzi (gu machine) and live happily together. But one day a group of monsters appeared in front of them. At the time of crisis, the mysterious power of the brother awakened and defeated the monsters, but his younger sister Kilo was captured, so Xiaofeng embarked on a journey to find his younger sister. On the way, I met Wayong (Walong/Wolong), a one-armed boy. The two became partners and became attached to Yameo (Black Cat/Felicia). Later, the two met Shuemy's mother and Vulcan/Three-legged Golden Crow in the desert, and found that Shuemy was also a partner. The three set off and met Honma. After all kinds of hardships, the four friends finally defeated the darkness  (translated from CCTV)

title: Qi Qimiao Le Xing
synopsis: "Curious and Wonderful Music Stars" is an animated comedy series focusing on the growth of children and children. Each episode has an independent story, depicting the Miao Lexing and pet family and classmates in daily life in the area near the home school. A little thing at a certain day and time. Through character depiction to show the growing Miao Lexing, it provides entertainment and learning for the growing children who are full of ideas and ideas.  (translated from bilibili)

title: Xiao Xingxing Hua Dian
synopsis: A constellation love story that belongs to everyone.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tangguo Taikong Aoyou Ji Zhi Nengliang Zhi Xing
synopsis: Through optimistic efforts, the candy elves overcame the difficult communication problems between civilizations in the first part, continued their legendary energy gathering journey, and obtained the most precious wealth in life.  (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 糖果太空遨游记之能量之星

title: Tangguo Taikong Aoyou Ji Zhi Xingqiu Chong Su
synopsis: "Super Buzz" is in space, where the Candy Man travels, trades, and adventures, and actively faces difficult stories in life.  (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 糖果太空遨游记之星球重塑

title: Xiao Tu Ban Di
synopsis: There is a little rabbit named "Ban Di", he likes to invent some small things, and he considers himself "Lu Ban's disciple". Bandi’s inventions and creations often help everyone to solve problems. The adjustable harrier doll can’t tolerate Bandi’s stealing the limelight with him, making trouble for Bandi everywhere, and the clever Bandi always wins with his wit and cleverness.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Tu Ban Di 2
synopsis: There is a little rabbit named "Ban Di", he likes to invent some small things, and he considers himself "Lu Ban's disciple". Bandi’s inventions and creations often help everyone to solve problems. The adjustable harrier doll can’t tolerate Bandi’s stealing the limelight with him, making trouble for Bandi everywhere, and the clever Bandi always wins with his wit and cleverness.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Tu Ban Di Zhi Xingji Qi Lu
synopsis: There is a little rabbit named "Ban Di", he likes to invent some small things, and he considers himself "Lu Ban's disciple". Bandi’s inventions and creations often help everyone to solve problems. The adjustable harrier doll can’t tolerate Bandi’s stealing the limelight with him, making trouble for Bandi everywhere, and the clever Bandi always wins with his wit and cleverness.  (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Tu Ban Di Zhi Haidao Tanxian Ji
synopsis: Little Bunny and his group went on a trip, but accidentally fell onto an island. There is no signal, no rescue, no food, and all kinds of strange things emerge in endlessly. What secrets are hidden on this island? What kind of knowledge should Pandi use to find food, find water sources, and use various tools to save himself? All questions surround everyone. There will always be unsatisfactory times in life, but their optimistic spirit and adaptability will become an example for children, telling children how to build self-confidence in desperate situations and how to use all the conditions around them to save themselves. If we work together, we will achieve something.  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 小兔班弟之海岛探险记

title: Xiao Tu Ban Di Zhi Fanhang Zongdongyuan
synopsis: Bandi and his group lived on the island for a while, but they never gave up the idea of returning to the voyage, looking for lost communication equipment everywhere. They planned to prepare equipment for repairing the spacecraft on the beach, but accidentally encountered the shark grandma who had not seen her for a long time. While helping Grandma Shark, they also inadvertently found the parts they needed from Grandma Shark, helped them repair their communication equipment, and got in touch with the outside world to rescue them. After sending off Grandma Shark, everyone is ready to say goodbye to everything on the island. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 小兔班弟之返航总动员

title: Mengxiang Zongdongyuan season2
synopsis: In the real world, the male protagonist Xiaote and the heroine Xiao Fei are ordinary children, but in the dream world they are both "superheroes"! They take the dream elves with special abilities into the dreams of children who have nightmares to fight against the dreamers who want to cause trouble to attract attention, stop the dreamers' pranks, and protect the happy and wonderful dream world for the children.  (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 梦想总动员 第二季

title: Wei Wei Hou Zhi Qingchun Fangxian
synopsis: The residents of Smart Town live in their own big tree houses. A series of humorous things happened when the koala brothers and sisters Xiaozhi and Xiaohui, the residents of the small town, met Biku Monkey from another planet  (translated from baidu baike)

title: Shikong Bowu Ka
synopsis: The representative artifacts and specimens from the Mawangdui Han Tomb in the Hunan Provincial Museum's collection are used as materials. It tells the story of Wang Xiaohan, a witty young man based on Wang Han, the image ambassador of the Hunan Provincial Museum. The wife's son, Li Hun, became friends, experienced life in the Western Han Dynasty, and joined forces with the Chen Hou family to fight against evil forces. After going through difficulties and obstacles, he finally returned to the modern age.  (translated from douban)

title: Ershisi Jieqi De Gushi
synopsis: Twenty-four solar terms refer to the twenty-four seasons and climate. It is the crystallization of the accumulation of long-term experience and wisdom of the working people of the Han nationality in ancient China. It can reflect the changes of the seasons, guide agricultural activities, and affect the food, clothing, housing and transportation of thousands of households. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yangguang Shibing
synopsis: Sunshine Soldier tells a series of stories that happened in a guard squad. The whole drama revolves around themes such as strengthening the army and serving the country, serving the people, loving the army, and learning the law and discipline. It combines animation art with military life. It uses vivid and infectious military stories to portray the modern military The cool, fashionable, sunny and open image shows the fiery life of the modern military camp that is full of pride and warmth, intense and serious, and warm and friendly. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Summertime Render
synopsis: After his parents died, Shinpei Ajiro lived with the Kofune sisters, Mio and Ushio, but he has since moved to live on his own in Tokyo. But after Ushio drowns while trying to save the young Shiori Kobayakawa, he returns home to mourn her departure. However, bruises around Ushio's neck bring her cause of death into question. Taking a step back, Shinpei becomes convinced there must be another explanation. Dangerous entities roam among the islanders, and a vision of deceased Ushio asks him to "save Mio" as her final request. He is certain that something is afoot—and Ushio's death is only a piece of the puzzle. With the help of Mio and various others, Shinpei struggles to forge a future in which he, his friends, and family can stay alive. But the more he investigates, the more impossible such a future seems. This darkness infiltrates his home island. Just how much more suffering will he go through before finding the right path to save it all?

title: Stellar Transformations
synopsis: In a galaxy far away, there is a kid without innate ability to practice internal techniques. So, in order to gain the respect of his father, he resolutely chooses to follow the more difficult and painful path of practicing external techniques. As the years go by, he grows up, but what really changes his life is a mysterious meteoric crystal stone – the Meteoric Tear. This stone fuses with the young man’s body unnoticed, and he seems to undergo drastic transformations as a result. After that, everything is changed. Eventually his father knows that the son for whom he hasn’t really shown a lot of consideration possesses astonishing abilities. And there’s a lot more to come.

title: Juedui Lingyu
synopsis: In order to complete the family trial, Young Xiu came alone to the Polar Academy, which is located in the Holy War of Gods and Demons. The Academy equips every student with academic gloves that can activate the weapon system. Using the gloves, every student can continue to practice and grow. So there is a chance to finally comprehend powerful domain forces such as time and space manipulation, teleportation, etc. However, in this weak and strong academy, they also sneaked into the survivors of the Demon Race, and their figures were ready to move in the dark. And while Xiu was on his way to the peak of this challenge field, he also gradually discovered the untold and shocking secrets of his life experience. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Juedui Lingyu Zhi Ji Zhan Ji
synopsis: In order to complete the family trial, Young Xiu came alone to the Polar Academy, which is located in the Holy War of Gods and Demons. The Academy equips every student with academic gloves that can activate the weapon system. Using the gloves, every student can continue to practice and grow. So there is a chance to finally comprehend powerful domain forces such as time and space manipulation, teleportation, etc. However, in this weak and strong academy, they also sneaked into the survivors of the Demon Race, and their figures were ready to move in the dark. And while Xiu was on his way to the peak of this challenge field, he also gradually discovered the untold and shocking secrets of his life experience.  (translated from baidu baike)
